org.sensorhub.impl.service.sos

Class SensorDataProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.impl.service.sos.StreamDataProvider
      • org.sensorhub.impl.service.sos.SensorDataProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventListener, ISOSDataProvider

    public class SensorDataProvider
extends StreamDataProvider
implements ISOSDataProvider, IEventListener

    Implementation of SOS data provider connecting to a sensor via SensorHub's sensor API (ISensorDataInterface).
    Most of the logic is inherited from StreamDataProvider.

    Since:
    Sep 7, 2013
    Author:
    Alex Robin
